channel.title: Give me unlimited hp?
channel.description: how do i give me unlimted hp? and others? on delta? :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek:

item.title: Give me unlimited hp?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:12, topic:275440”]Or you can do it the shit way, I guess…

In the client.java process boolean, add this.

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOURNAMEHERE")){ if(playerStat[3] < 99)playerStat[3] = 99; }Something like that. Most likely not a direct copy/paste action.[/quote]

Process is bad doucher.

Nah, JK:

<3 Lin.

Read full topic

item.title: Give me unlimited hp?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Or you can do it the shit way, I guess…

In the client.java process boolean, add this.

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOURNAMEHERE")){ if(playerStat[3] < 99)playerStat[3] = 99; }Something like that. Most likely not a direct copy/paste action.

item.title: Give me unlimited hp?
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

[quote="_Vengeance, post:10, topic:275440"]Find where it decreases your hp, and disable it for yourself.
And why is there a trend for making admins invincible?[/quote]

I find it ok I guess. But I might not go with you on the whole disabling the decreasing hp for admins. That would be a good idea unless the admin ever wanted to return back to normal hp. So I think a command is the best way to go on this one.

Read full topic

item.title: Give me unlimited hp?

item.description:

item.title: Give me unlimited hp?
item.dc:creator: @lil_wayne612 lil wayne612
item.description:
@lil_wayne612 wrote:

[quote="_Vengeance, post:8, topic:275440"][quote author=im hard link=topic=363855.msg2762865#msg2762865 date=1240634544]

noob if you cant do this

Shut up, some people are new to moparscape and need to learn how to do stuff like this.
I’m sure you didn’t even know how to start your server when you came…?
[/quote]

Then maybe they should stop and think about the problem for a second.
If they don’t want their HP to decrease, how about they disable that function for themselves.
Much more efficient than setting your HP to some ridiculous number and hoping it doesn’t drain.[/quote]

how would i do that?

Read full topic

item.title: Give me unlimited hp?

[/quote]

Shut up, some people are new to moparscape and need to learn how to do stuff like this.
I’m sure you didn’t even know how to start your server when you came…?[/quote]

Then maybe they should stop and think about the problem for a second.
If they don’t want their HP to decrease, how about they disable that function for themselves.
Much more efficient than setting your HP to some ridiculous number and hoping it doesn’t drain.

item.title: Give me unlimited hp?
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

The problem is if you eat a piece of food or gain a level, it will reset. So making a command to give you infinite hp would be better than going into your character file and manually editing it every time.

Read full topic

item.title: Give me unlimited hp?
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“lil wayne612, post:1, topic:275440”]how do i give me unlimted hp? and others? on delta? :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek:[/quote]character-skill = 3 100000 200000000

Try it?

Ahh, Hard, you beat me too it!

Read full topic

item.title: Give me unlimited hp?
item.dc:creator: @im_hard im hard
item.description:
@im_hard wrote:

Go to chars file.
Find the char yo want to edit.
Find this:

character-skill = 3 10 1155

Change the 10 to 9999999 and change the exp.
It should look like this:
character-skill = 3 9999999 100000000

Read full topic
